text: In this article, we explore how to integrate Firebase Auth
tokens with a custom back-end server,
discover how to verify user authentication
on a custom back-end using Firebase and Node.js.
The guide explains how to utilize Firebase's admin SDK
to securely manage ID tokens from the client side.
It also discusses token lifetime limitations
and offers tips on storing tokens in Firestore
If you're interested, be sure to read the full article
